about.name: Đàm Quang Thịnh
university: School of Information and Communication Technology
Hanoi University of Science and Technology
about.address: Room 210, Building C1, No. 1 Dai Co Viet, Hai Ba Trung, Hanoi, Vietnam

research_interests: SOFTWARE QUALITY; SOFTWARE TESTING; METHODS IN SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT

academic.level: PHD DEGREE IN INFORMATION AND COMPUTER SCIENCES
academic.descript: PhD thesis: Architectural model of a class numerical computing machine and its application on generating smooth curves and surface

academic.level: PHD DEGREE IN INFORMATION AND COMPUTER SCIENCES
academic.descript: PhD thesis: Architectural model of a class numerical computing machine and its application on generating smooth curves and surface

academic.level: BS & MS (DUAL DEGREE), ELECTRONICS AND INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
academic.descript: MS thesis: Building and examining a software model of a class numerical computing machine

content.name: Phd Thesis Supervised
list_content: Pham Thi Quynh (2007-2010): Measurement and checking Web service and business process
Nguyen Thi Thanh Tu (10/2009-10/2013): Design and construction industrial process controlling and monitoring system based OPCUA
Nguyen Minh Quy (10/2010-10/2014): Performance Analysis of Parallel Computing Architectures
Nguyen Hung Cuong (10/2012-10/2015): Software Reliability Evaluation Models using Markov chain and NHPP approaches (Tools to Support Software Reliability Modeling - TSSRM can be downloaded here)

content.name: Current Phd Students
list_content: Tran Dinh Dien (8/2014-8/2019): Model-Based Software Development for Web Applications
Nguyen Ngoc Tuan (8/2014-8/2019): Risk Management in Software Project Scheduling using Bayesian Network
Vu Van Doc (6/2015 - 6/2019): Methods for Software Performance Analysis from UML Specification
Trinh Bao Ngoc (6/2015-6/2019): Studying on Applying Game Theory and Nash Equilibrium in Project Management

research_grant: Cloud service technologies - creation and providing services, provide digital content, access management. Funded by the Ministry of Science and Technology. Project Code KC.01.01/11-15

Research on Cloud Computing/Map-Reduce and Application in Student and Alumni information Management and Extraction. Funded by the Ministry of Education and Training. Project Code B2010-01-411-TĐ. http://www.BKProfile.com (in Vietnamese)
Mechanism and Advanced Techniques for Software Development and Software Quality Assurance (2006-2009). Funded by the Ministry of Science and Technology. Project Code: KHCB2.034.06.
Fault-Tolerant Software Development Techniques and Application in BKEC (2005-2006). Funded by the Ministry of Education and Training. Project/ Code B2005-28-180

Mechanism and Models of Cost Estimation, Metrics and Management for Software Development (2004-2005). Funded by the Ministry of Science and Technology. Project Code: KHCB 23.06.04 Principles and Mechanism of Software Development (2001-2003). Funded by the Ministry of Science and Technology. Project Code: KHCB 23.07.01
